element.name: gmd:MD_ScopeCode
element.label: Scope code
element.description: Class of information to which the referencing entity applies

element.name: code
element.label: Code
element.description: Alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace
element.help: alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace

element.name: code
element.label: System code
element.description: Code. i.e. EPSG code.

element.name: code
element.label: Code
element.description: Value code

element.name: codeSpace
element.label: Reference Authority
element.description: Authority responsible for codification. i.e. EPSG

element.name: gco:Date
element.label: Edition Date
element.description: Date of the edition

element.name: gco:Date
element.label: Date
element.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12 (YYYY-MM-DD)
element.help: reference date and event used to describe it

element.name: gco:DateTime
element.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)
element.label: Usage Date / Time
element.help: date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series

element.name: gco:DateTime
element.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)
element.label: Planned Available Date / Time
element.help: date and time when theresource will be available

element.name: gco:Measure
element.label: Name of Measure
element.description: Name of the test applied to the data

element.name: gco:Measure
element.label: Unit of Measure
element.description: Vertical units used for vertical extent information Examples: metres, feet, millimetres, hectopascals

element.name: gmd:CI_Address
element.label: Address
element.description: Location of the responsible individual or organization

element.name: gmd:CI_Citation
element.label: Citation
element.description: Standardised resource reference

element.name: gmd:CI_Contact
element.label: Contact
element.description: Information required to enable contact with the responsible person and/or organization

element.name: gmd:CI_Date
element.label: Date
element.description: Reference date and event used to describe it (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: gmd:CI_OnlineResource
element.label: OnLine resource
element.description: Information about on-line sources from which the dataset, specification, or community profile name and extended metadata elements can be obtained

element.name: gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty
element.label: Responsible party
element.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations associated with the dataset

element.name: gmd:CI_Series
element.label: Series
element.description: Information about the series, or aggregate dataset, to which a dataset belongs

element.name: gmd:CI_Telephone
element.label: Telephone
element.description: Telephone numbers for contacting the responsible individual or organization

element.name: gmd:DQ_AbsoluteExternalPositionalAccuracy
element.label: Absolute external positional accuracy
element.description: Closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: gmd:DQ_AccuracyOfATimeMeasurement
element.label: Accuracy of time measurement
element.description: Correctness of the temporal references of an item (reporting of error in time measurement)

element.name: gmd:DQ_CompletenessCommission
element.label: Completeness commission
element.description: Excess data present in the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: gmd:DQ_CompletenessOmission
element.label: Completeness omission
element.description: Data absent from the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency
element.label: Conceptual consistency
element.description: Adherence to rules of the conceptual schema

element.name: gmd:DQ_ConformanceResult
element.label: Conformance result
element.description: Information about the outcome of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

element.name: gmd:DQ_DataQuality
element.label: Data quality
element.description: Quality information for the data specified by a data quality scope

element.name: gmd:DQ_DomainConsistency
element.label: Domain consistency
element.description: Adherence of values to the value domains

element.name: gmd:DQ_FormatConsistency
element.label: Format consistency
element.description: Degree to which data is stored in accordance with the physical structure of the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: gmd:DQ_GriddedDataPositionalAccuracy
element.label: Gridded data positional accuracy
element.description: Closeness of gridded data position values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: gmd:DQ_NonQuantitativeAttributeAccuracy
element.label: Non quantitative attribute accuracy
element.description: Correctness of non-quantitative attributes

element.name: gmd:DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy
element.label: Quantitative attribute accuracy
element.description: Accuracy of quantitative attributes

element.name: gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult
element.label: Quantitative result
element.description: The values or information about the value(s) (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure

element.name: gmd:DQ_RelativeInternalPositionalAccuracy
element.label: Relative internal positional accuracy
element.description: Closeness of the relative positions of features in the scope to their respective relative positions accepted as or being true

element.name: gmd:DQ_Scope
element.label: Scope
element.description: Description of the data specified by the scope
element.help: extent of characteristic(s) of the data for which quality information is reported

element.name: gmd:DQ_TemporalConsistency
element.label: Temporal consistency
element.description: Correctness of ordered events or sequences, if reported

element.name: gmd:DQ_TemporalValidity
element.label: Temporal validity
element.description: Validity of data specified by the scope with respect to time

element.name: gmd:DQ_ThematicClassificationCorrectness
element.label: Thematic classification correctness
element.description: Comparison of the classes assigned to features or their attributes to a universe of discourse

element.name: gmd:DQ_TopologicalConsistency
element.label: Topological consistency
element.description: Correctness of the explicitly encoded topological characteristics of the dataset as described by the scope

element.name: gmd:EX_BoundingPolygon
element.label: Bounding Polygon
element.description: Boundary enclosing the dataset, expressed as the closed set of (x,y) coordinates of the polygon (last point replicates first point)

element.name: gmd:EX_Extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Information about spatial, vertical, and temporal extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Information about horizonal, vertical, and temporal extent

element.name: gmd:EX_GeographicBoundingBox
element.label: Geographic bounding box
element.description: Geographic position of the dataset

element.name: gmd:EX_GeographicDescription
element.label: Geographic description
element.description: Description of the geographic area using identifiers

element.name: gmd:EX_SpatialTemporalExtent
element.label: Spatial Temporal Extent
element.description: Extent with respect to date/time and spatial boundaries

element.name: gmd:EX_TemporalExtent
element.label: Temporal Extent
element.description: Time period covered by the content of the dataset

element.name: gmd:EX_VerticalExtent
element.label: Vertical extent
element.description: Vertical domain of dataset

element.name: gmd:ISBN
element.label: ISBN
element.description: International Standard Book Number

element.name: gmd:ISSN
element.label: ISSN
element.description: International Standard Serial Number

element.name: gmd:LI_Lineage
element.label: Lineage
element.description: Information about the events or source data used in constructing the data specified by the scope or lack of knowledge about lineage

element.name: gmd:LI_ProcessStep
element.label: Process step
element.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope
element.help: information about an event or transformation in the life of a dataset including the process used to maintain the dataset

element.name: gmd:LI_Source
element.label: Source
element.description: Information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:MD_AggregateInformation
element.label: Aggregate Information
element.description: Aggregate dataset information

element.name: gmd:MD_ApplicationSchemaInformation
element.description: Information about the application schema used to build the dataset
element.label: Application Schema Information

element.name: gmd:MD_Band
element.label: Band
element.description: Range of wavelengths in the electromagnetic spectrum
element.help: range of wavelengths in the electromagnetic spectrum

element.name: gmd:MD_BrowseGraphic
element.description: Graphic that provides an illustration of the dataset (should include a legend for the graphic)
element.label: Browse Graphic

element.name: gmd:MD_Constraints
element.label: Constraints
element.description: Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata

element.name: gmd:MD_CoverageDescription
element.label: Coverage description
element.description: Information about the content of a grid data cell

element.name: gmd:MD_DataIdentification
element.label: Data identification
element.description: Information required to identify a dataset

element.name: gmd:MD_DigitalTransferOptions
element.label: Digital transfer options
element.description: Technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: gmd:MD_Dimension
element.label: Dimension
element.description: Axis properties

element.name: gmd:MD_Distribution
element.label: Distribution
element.description: Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource

element.name: gmd:MD_Distributor
element.label: Distributor
element.description: Information about the distributor

element.name: gmd:MD_ExtendedElementInformation
element.description: New metadata element, not found in ISO 19115, which is required to describe geographic data
element.label: Extended Element Information

element.name: gmd:MD_FeatureCatalogueDescription
element.label: Feature catalogue description
element.description: Information identifying the feature catalogue or the conceptual schema

element.name: gmd:MD_Format
element.label: Format
element.description: Description of the computer language construct that specifies the representation of data objects in a record, file, message, storage device or transmission channel

element.name: gmd:MD_GeometricObjects
element.label: Geometric objects
element.description: Number of objects, listed by geometric object type, used in the dataset

element.name: gmd:MD_Georectified
element.label: Georectified
element.description: Grid whose cells are regularly spaced in a geographic (i.e., lat / long) or map coordinate system defined in the Spatial Referencing System (SRS) so that any cell in the grid can be geolocated given its grid coordinate and the grid origin, cell spacing, and orientation

element.name: gmd:MD_Georeferenceable
element.label: Georeferenceable
element.description: Grid with cells irregularly spaced in any given geographic/map projection coordinate system, whose individual cells can be geolocated using geolocation information supplied with the data but cannot be geolocated from the grid properties alone

element.name: gmd:MD_GridSpatialRepresentation
element.label: Grid spatial representation
element.description: Information about grid spatial objects in the dataset

element.name: gmd:MD_Identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Value uniquely identifying an object within a namespace

element.name: gmd:MD_ImageDescription
element.label: Image description
element.description: Information about an image's suitability for use

element.name: gmd:MD_Keywords
element.label: Keywords
element.description: Keywords, their type and reference source

element.name: gmd:MD_LegalConstraints
element.label: Legal constraints
element.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata

element.name: gmd:MD_MaintenanceInformation
element.label: Maintenance information
element.description: Information about the scope and frequency of updating

element.name: gmd:MD_Medium
element.label: Medium
element.description: Information about the media on which the resource can be distributed

element.name: gmd:MD_Metadata
element.label: Metadata
element.description: Root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

element.name: gmd:MD_MetadataExtensionInformation
element.description: Information describing metadata extensions
element.label: Metadata Extension Information
element.description: Information describing metadata extensions

element.name: gmd:MD_PortrayalCatalogueReference
element.label: Portrayal catalogue reference
element.description: Information identifying the portrayal catalogue used
element.label: Portrayal Catalogue Reference

element.name: gmd:MD_RangeDimension
element.label: Range dimension
element.description: Information on the range of each dimension of a cell measurement value

element.name: gmd:MD_ReferenceSystem
element.label: Reference system
element.description: Information about the reference system.

element.name: gmd:MD_RepresentativeFraction
element.label: Representative fraction
element.description: Derived from Scale where MD_RepresentativeFraction.denominator = 1 / Scale.measure And Scale.targetUnits = Scale.sourceUnits

element.name: gmd:MD_Resolution
element.label: Resolution
element.description: Level of detail expressed as a scale factor or a ground distance

element.name: gmd:MD_ScopeDescription
element.label: Scope description
element.description: Description of the class of information covered by the information
element.condition: Either attributes, features, featureInstances, attributeInstnaces, dataset or other must be provided

element.name: gmd:MD_SecurityConstraints
element.label: Security constraints
element.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the resource or metadata for national security or similar security concerns

element.name: gmd:MD_ServiceIdentification
element.label: Service Identification
element.description: Identification of capabilities which a service provider makes available to a service user through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour - See ISO 19119 - Services for further information

element.name: gmd:MD_StandardOrderProcess
element.label: Standard order process
element.description: Common ways in which the resource may be obtained or received, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: gmd:MD_Usage
element.label: Usage
element.description: Brief description of ways in which the resource(s) is/are currently used

element.name: gmd:MD_VectorSpatialRepresentation
element.label: Vector spatial representation
element.description: Information about the vector spatial objects in the dataset

element.name: gmd:PT_FreeText
element.label: Free text
element.description: Description of a multi-language free text metadata element

element.name: gmd:RS_Identifier
element.description: Identifier used for reference systems
element.label: Identifier

element.name: gmd:URL
element.label: URL
element.description: URL

element.name: gmd:abstract
element.label: Abstract
element.description: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:accessConstraints
element.label: Access constraints
element.description: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource

element.name: gmd:address
element.label: Address
element.description: Address of the responsible party

element.name: gmd:address
element.label: Address
element.description: Physical and email address at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: gmd:administrativeArea
element.label: Administrative area
element.description: State, province of the location

element.name: gmd:aggregateDataSetIdentifier
element.label: Aggregate Datasetindentifier
element.description: Identification information about aggregate dataset

element.name: gmd:aggregateDataSetName
element.label: Aggregate Datasetname
element.description: Citation information about the aggregate dataset

element.name: gmd:aggregationInfo
element.label: Aggregation Information
element.description: Provides aggregate dataset information

element.name: gmd:alternateTitle
element.label: Alternate title
element.description: Short name or other language name by which the cited information is known. Example: "DCW" as an alternative title for "Digital Chart of the World

element.name: gmd:amendmentNumber
element.label: Amendment number
element.description: Amendment number of the format version

element.name: gmd:applicationProfile
element.label: Application profile
element.description: Name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource

element.name: gmd:applicationSchemaInfo
element.label: Application schema info
element.description: Provides information about the conceptual schema of a dataset

element.name: gmd:associationType
element.label: Association Type
element.description: Association type of the aggregate dataset

element.name: gmd:attributeDescription
element.label: Attribute description
element.description: Description of the attribute described by the measurement value

element.name: gmd:attributeInstances
element.label: Attribute instances
element.description: Attribute instances to which the information applies

element.name: gmd:attributes
element.label: Attributes
element.description: Attributes to which the information applies

element.name: gmd:authority
element.label: Authority
element.description: Person or party responsible for maintenance of the namespace

element.name: gmd:axisDimensionProperties
element.label: Axis Dimensions Properties
element.description: Information about spatial-temporal axis properties

element.name: gmd:bitsPerValue
element.label: Bits per value
element.description: Maximum number of significant bits in the uncompressed representation for the value in each band of each pixel

element.name: gmd:cameraCalibrationInformationAvailability
element.label: Camera calibration information availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not constants are available which allow for camera calibration corrections

element.name: gmd:cellGeometry
element.label: Cell geometry
element.description: Identification of grid data as point or cell

element.name: gmd:centerPoint
element.label: Center point
element.description: Earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cell halfway between opposite ends of the grid in the spatial dimensions

element.name: gmd:characterSet
element.label: Character set
element.description: Full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set
element._condition: conditional / ISO/IEC 10646-1 not used and not defined by encoding?

element.name: gmd:characterSet
element.label: Character set
element.description: Full name of the character coding standard used for the dataset

element.name: gmd:characterSet
element.label: Character set
element.description: Full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set

element.name: gmd:checkPointAvailability
element.description: Indication of whether or not geographic position points are available to test the accuracy of the georeferenced grid data
element.label: Checkpoint Availability

element.name: gmd:checkPointDescription
element.description: Description of geographic position points used to test the accuracy of the georeferenced grid data
element.label: Checkpoint Description

element.name: gmd:citation
element.label: Citation
element.description: Citation data for the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:citation
element.label: Citation
element.description: Citation which belongs to the authority

element.name: gmd:citation
element.label: Citation
element.description: Citation of the thesaurus

element.name: gmd:citation
element.label: Citation
element.description: Citation data for the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:citedResponsibleParty
element.label: Cited responsible party
element.description: Name and position information for an individual or organization that is responsible for the resource

element.name: gmd:city
element.label: City
element.description: City of the location

element.name: gmd:classification
element.label: Classification
element.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the resource or metadata

element.name: gmd:classificationSystem
element.label: Classification system
element.description: Name of the classification system
element.label: Classification System

element.name: gmd:cloudCoverPercentage
element.label: Cloud cover percentage
element.description: Area of the dataset obscured by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent

element.name: gmd:code
element.label: Code
element.description: Alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace

element.name: gmd:code
element.description: Value code

element.name: gmd:codeSpace
element.label: Codespace
element.description: Name or identifier of the person or organization responsible for namespace

element.name: gmd:collectiveTitle
element.label: Collective title
element.description: Common title with holdings note. NOTE title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cited
element.help: This field is used to name the Basic Geodata as defined in the GeoIV Annex I, as it is possible that there are more than 1 "physical" datasets assigned to 1 legal entry. E.g.: Entry no. 47 "Geophysikalisches Kartenwerk" consists of 3 datasets "Geophysikalische Karten 1:500000", "Geophysikalische Spezialkarten" and "Gravimetrischer Atlas 1:100000"

element.name: gmd:complianceCode
element.label: Compliance code
element.description: Indication of whether or not the cited feature catalogue complies with ISO 19110

element.name: gmd:compressionGenerationQuantity
element.label: Compression generation quantity
element.description: Count of the number the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image

element.name: gmd:condition
element.label: Condition
element.description: Condition under which the extended element is mandatory

element.name: gmd:constraintLanguage
element.label: Constraint language
element.description: Formal language used in Application Schema

element.name: gmd:contact
element.label: Contact
element.description: Party responsible for the metadata information

element.name: gmd:contact
element.label: Contact
element.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) with responsability for maintaining the metadata

element.name: gmd:contact
element.label: Metadata author
element.description: Party responsible for the metadata information

element.name: gmd:contactInfo
element.description: Address of the responsible party
element.label: Contact Information

element.name: gmd:contactInstructions
element.label: Contact instructions
element.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organization

element.name: gmd:contentInfo
element.description: Provides information about the feature catalogue and describes the coverage and image data characteristics
element.label: Content Information

element.name: gmd:contentType
element.label: Content type
element.description: Type of information represented by the cell value

element.name: gmd:controlPointAvailability
element.description: Indication of whether or not control point(s) exists
element.label: Controlpoint Availability

element.name: gmd:cornerPoints
element.label: Corner points
element.description: Earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cells at opposite ends of grid coverage along two diagonals in the grid spatial dimensions. There are four corner points in a georectified grid; at least two corner points along one diagonal are required

element.name: gmd:country
element.label: Country
element.description: Country of the physical address

element.name: gmd:country
element.label: Country
element.description: Country in which the law was issued

element.name: gmd:country
element.label: Country
element.description: Country of language used for documenting a plain text

element.name: gmd:credit
element.label: Credit
element.description: Recognition of those who contributed to the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:dataQualityInfo
element.label: Data quality info
element.description: Provides overall assessment of quality of a resource(s)

element.name: gmd:dataSetURI
element.label: Dataset URI
element.description: Uniformed Resource Identifier (URI) of the dataset to which the metadata applies
element.help: Uniformed Resource Identifier (URI) of the dataset to which the metadata applies. This link refers direct to the machine-readable dataset.

element.name: gmd:dataType
element.label: Data type
element.description: Code which identifies the kind of valueprovidedeprovided in the extended element

element.name: gmd:dataset
element.description: Dataset to which the information applies
element.label: Dataset

element.name: gmd:date
element.label: Date
element.description: Reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: gmd:date
element.label: Date of last update
element.description: Date of last update

element.name: gmd:date
element.label: Date of next update
element.description: Scheduled revision date for resource

element.name: gmd:date
element.label: Date
element.description: Reference date for the cited resource

element.name: gmd:date
element.label: Date
element.description: Reference date for the cited resource

element.name: gmd:dateOfNextUpdate
element.label: Date of next update
element.description: Scheduled revision date for resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: gmd:dateStamp
element.label: Date stamp
element.description: Date that the metadata was created (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: gmd:dateTime
element.description: Date and time or range of date and time on or over which the process step occurred (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)
element.label: Date / Time
element.description: Date and time or range of date and time on or over which the process step occurred

element.name: gmd:dateTime
element.label: Date / Time
element.description: Date or range of dates on which a data quality measure was applied

element.name: gmd:dateType
element.label: Date type
element.description: Event used for reference date

element.name: gmd:definition
element.label: Definition
element.description: Definition of the extended element

element.name: gmd:deliveryPoint
element.label: Delivery point
element.description: Address line for the location (as described in ISO 11180, annex A)

element.name: gmd:denominator
element.label: Denominator
element.description: The number below the line in a vulgar fraction
element.condition: add either a denominator or a distance

element.name: gmd:density
element.label: Density
element.description: Density at which the data is recorded

element.name: gmd:densityUnits
element.label: Density units
element.description: Units of measure for the recording density

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Detailed description of the level of the source data

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Spatial and temporal extent for the referring object
element._condition: Conditional / geographicElement and temporalElement and verticalElement not documented?

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description of the code domain

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Value description
element.description: Description of the value

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Attribute description

element.name: gmd:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Role description

element.name: gmd:descriptiveKeywords
element.label: Descriptive keywords
element.description: Provides category keywords, their type, and reference source

element.name: gmd:descriptor
element.label: Descriptor
element.description: Description of the range of a cell measurement value

element.name: gmd:dimension
element.label: Dimension
element.description: Information on the dimensions of the cell measurement value

element.name: gmd:dimensionName
element.label: Dimension name
element.description: Name of the axis

element.name: gmd:dimensionSize
element.label: Dimension size
element.description: Number of elements along the axis

element.name: gmd:distance
element.label: Distance
element.description: Ground sample distance
element.condition: Provide a distance if no equivalent Scale is documented

element.name: gmd:distributionFormat
element.label: Distribution format
element.description: Provides a description of the format of the data to be distributed

element.name: gmd:distributionInfo
element.description: Provides information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource(s)
element.label: Distribution Information

element.name: gmd:distributionOrderProcess
element.label: Distribution / Order Process
element.description: Provides information about how the resource may be obtained, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: gmd:distributor
element.label: Distributor
element.description: Provides information about the distributor

element.name: gmd:distributorContact
element.label: Distributor contact
element.description: Party from whom the resource may be obtained. This list need not be exhaustive

element.name: gmd:distributorFormat
element.label: Distributor format
element.description: Provides information about the format used by the distributor

element.name: gmd:distributorTransferOptions
element.label: Distributor transfer options
element.description: Provides information about the technical means and media used by the distributor

element.name: gmd:domainCode
element.label: Domain code
element.description: Three digit code assigned to the extended element

element.name: gmd:domainOfValidity
element.label: Domain of validity
element.description: Range which is valid for the referencesystem

element.name: gmd:domainValue
element.label: Domain value
element.description: Valid values that can be assigned to the extended element

element.name: gmd:eastBoundLongitude
element.label: East bound
element.description: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: gmd:edition
element.label: Edition
element.description: Version of the cited resource

element.name: gmd:editionDate
element.label: Edition date
element.description: Date of the edition (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: gmd:electronicMailAddress
element.label: Electronic mail address
element.description: Address of the electronic mailbox of the responsible organization or individual

element.name: gmd:environmentDescription
element.label: Environment description
element.description: Description of the dataset in the producer_s processing environment, including items such as the software, the computer operating system, file name, and the dataset size

element.name: gmd:equivalentScale
element.label: Equivalent scale
element.description: Level of detail expressed as the scale of a comparable hardcopy map or chart

element.name: gmd:errorStatistic
element.label: Error statistic
element.description: Statistical method used to determine the value

element.name: gmd:evaluationMethodDescription
element.label: Evaluation method description
element.description: Description of the evaluation method

element.name: gmd:evaluationMethodType
element.label: Evaluation Method
element.description: Type of method used to evaluate quality of the dataset

element.name: gmd:evaluationProcedure
element.label: Evaluation procedure
element.description: Reference to the procedure information

element.name: gmd:explanation
element.label: Explanation
element.description: Explanation of the meaning of conformance for this result

element.name: gmd:extendedElementInformation
element.label: Extended element information
element.description: Provides information about a new metadata element, not found in ISO 19115, which is required to describe geographic data

element.name: gmd:extensionOnLineResource
element.label: Extension Online resource
element.description: Information about on-line sources containing the community profile name and the extended metadata elements. Information for all new metadata elements

element.name: gmd:extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Extent information including the bounding polygon, vertical, and temporal extent of the dataset
element._condition: Conditional / if hierarchyLevel equals "dataset"? Either extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicBoundingBox or extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicDescription is required

element.name: gmd:extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Information about the horizontal, vertical and temporal extent of the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Date and time for the content of the dataset

element.name: gmd:extentTypeCode
element.label: Extent type code
element.description: Indication of whether the bounding polygon encompasses an area covered by the data or an area where data is not present. Possible values: '1' for inclusion or '0' for exclusion

element.name: gmd:facsimile
element.label: Facsimile
element.description: Telephone number of a facsimile machine for the responsible organization or individual

element.name: gmd:featureCatalogueCitation
element.label: Feature catalogue citation
element.description: Complete bibliographic reference to one or more external feature catalogues

element.name: gmd:featureInstances
element.label: Feature instances
element.description: Feature instances to which the information applies

element.name: gmd:featureTypes
element.label: Feature types
element.description: Subset of feature types from cited feature catalogue occurring in data

element.name: gmd:features
element.label: Features
element.description: Features to which the information applies

element.name: gmd:fees
element.label: Fees
element.description: Fees and terms for retrieving the resource. Include monetary units (as specified in ISO 4217)

element.name: gmd:fileDecompressionTechnique
element.label: File decompression technique
element.description: Recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied

element.name: gmd:fileDescription
element.label: File description
element.description: Text description of the illustration

element.name: gmd:fileIdentifier
element.label: File identifier
element.description: Unique identifier for this metadata file

element.name: gmd:fileName
element.label: File name
element.description: Name of the file that contains a graphic that provides an illustration of the dataset. It could be a public image document URL.

element.name: gmd:fileType
element.label: File type
element.description: Format in which the illustration is encoded
element.help: format in which the illustration is encoded Examples: CGM, EPS, GIF, JPEG, PBM, PS, TIFF, XWD

element.name: gmd:filmDistortionInformationAvailability
element.label: Film distortion information availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

element.name: gmd:formatDistributor
element.label: Format distributor
element.description: Provides information about the distributor’s format

element.name: gmd:function
element.label: Function
element.description: Code for function performed by the online resource

element.name: gmd:geographicElement
element.label: Geographic element
element.description: Provides geographic component of the extent of the referring object
element._condition: Conditional / description and temporalElement and verticalElement not documented?

element.name: gmd:geographicIdentifier
element.label: Geographic identifier
element.description: Identifier used to represent a geographic area

element.name: gmd:geometricObjectCount
element.label: Geometric object count
element.description: Total number of the point or vector object type occurring in the dataset

element.name: gmd:geometricObjectType
element.label: Geometric object type
element.description: Name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-, and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

element.name: gmd:geometricObjects
element.label: Geometric objects
element.description: Information about the geometric objects used in the dataset

element.name: gmd:georeferencedParameters
element.label: GeoreferencedParameters
element.description: GeoreferencedParameters

element.name: gmd:graphicOverview
element.label: Graphic overview
element.description: Provides a graphic that illustrates the resource(s) (should include a legend for the graphic)

element.name: gmd:graphicsFile
element.label: Graphics file
element.description: Full application schema given as a graphics file

element.name: gmd:handlingDescription
element.label: Handling description
element.description: Additional information about the restrictions on handling the resource

element.name: gmd:hierarchyLevel
element.label: Hierarchy level
element.description: Scope to which the metadata applies (see annex H for more information about metadata hierarchy levels)

element.name: gmd:hierarchyLevelName
element.label: Hierarchy level name
element.description: Name of the hierarchy levels for which the metadata is provided
element._condition: Conditional / hierarchyLevel is not equal to "dataset"?

element.name: gmd:hoursOfService
element.label: Hours of service
element.description: Time period (including time zone) when individuals can contact the organization or individual
element.label: Hours of Service

element.name: gmd:identificationInfo
element.label: Identification info
element.description: Basic information about the resource(s) to which the metadata applies

element.name: gmd:identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Unique identifier for the resource. EXAMPLE: Universal Product Code (UPC), National Stock Number (NSN)

element.name: gmd:identifier
element.label: Citation identifier
element.description: Identifier of the citation

element.name: gmd:identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Identifier which belongs to the authority

element.name: gmd:illuminationAzimuthAngle
element.label: Illumination azimuth angle
element.description: Illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: gmd:illuminationElevationAngle
element.label: Illumination elevation angle
element.description: Illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earth_s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: gmd:imageQualityCode
element.label: Image quality code
element.description: Specifies the image quality

element.name: gmd:imagingCondition
element.label: Imaging condition
element.description: Conditions affected the image

element.name: gmd:includedWithDataset
element.label: Included with dataset
element.description: Indication of whether or not the feature catalogue is included with the dataset

element.name: gmd:individualName
element.label: Individual name
element.description: Name of the responsible person- surname, given name, title separated by a delimiter
element._condition: Conditional / organisationName and positionName not documented?

element.name: gmd:initiativeType
element.label: Initiative Type
element.description: Type of initiative under which the aggregate dataset was produced

element.name: gmd:issueIdentification
element.label: Issue identification
element.description: Information identifying the issue of the series

element.name: gmd:keyword
element.label: Keyword
element.description: Commonly used word(s) or formalised word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject

element.name: gmd:language
element.label: Metadata language
element.description: Language used for documenting metadata

element.name: gmd:language
element.label: Language
element.description: Language(s) used within the dataset

element.name: gmd:language
element.label: Language
element.description: Language(s) used within the catalogue

element.name: gmd:lensDistortionInformationAvailability
element.label: Lens distortion information availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not lens aberration correction information is available

element.name: gmd:level
element.label: Hierarchy level
element.description: Hierarchical level of the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:levelDescription
element.label: Level description
element.description: Detailed description about the level of the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:lineage
element.label: Lineage
element.description: Non-quantitative quality information about the lineage of the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:linkage
element.label: Linkage
element.description: Location (address) for on-line access using a Uniform Resource Locator address or similar addressing scheme such as http://www.statkart.no/isotc211

element.name: gmd:maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency
element.label: Maintenance and update frequency
element.description: Frequency with which changes and additions are made to the resource after the initial resource is completed

element.name: gmd:maintenanceNote
element.label: Maintenance note
element.description: Information regarding specific requirements for maintaining the resource

element.name: gmd:maxValue
element.label: Maximum value
element.description: Longest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

element.name: gmd:maximumValue
element.label: Maximum value
element.description: Highest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: gmd:measureDescription
element.label: Measure description
element.description: Description of the measure being determined

element.name: gmd:measureIdentification
element.label: Measure identification
element.description: Code identifying a registered standard procedure

element.name: gmd:mediumFormat
element.label: Medium format
element.description: Method used to write to the medium

element.name: gmd:mediumNote
element.label: Medium note
element.description: Description of other limitations or requirements for using the medium

element.name: gmd:metadataConstraints
element.label: Metadata constraints
element.description: Provides restrictions on the access and use of metadata

element.name: gmd:metadataConstraints
element.label: Metadata constraints
element.description: Provides restrictions on the access and use of data

element.name: gmd:metadataExtensionInfo
element.description: Information describing metadata extensions
element.label: Metadata Extension Information

element.name: gmd:metadataMaintenance
element.label: Metadata maintenance
element.description: Provides information about the frequency of metadata updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: gmd:metadataStandardName
element.label: Metadata standard name
element.description: Name of the metadata standard (including profile name) used

element.name: gmd:metadataStandardVersion
element.label: Metadata standard version
element.description: Version (profile) of the metadata standard used

element.name: gmd:minValue
element.label: Minimum value
element.description: Shortest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

element.name: gmd:minimumValue
element.label: Minimum value
element.description: Lowest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the medium on which the resource can be received

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of reference system used

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the data transfer format(s)
element.help: name of the data transfer format(s)

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the extended metadata element

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the application schema used

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name of the resource
element.description: Name of the online resource

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Name of the code domain

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Value name

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Attribute name

element.name: gmd:name
element.label: Name
element.description: Role name

element.name: gmd:nameOfMeasure
element.label: Name of measure
element.description: Name of the test applied to the data

element.name: gmd:northBoundLatitude
element.label: North bound
element.description: Northern-most, coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: gmd:numberOfDimensions
element.label: Number of dimensions
element.description: Number of independent spatial-temporal axes

element.name: gmd:obligation
element.label: Obligation
element.description: Obligation of the extended element

element.name: gmd:offLine
element.label: Offline
element.description: Information about offline media on whichthe resource can be obtained

element.name: gmd:offset
element.label: Offset
element.description: The physical value corresponding to a cell value of zero

element.name: gmd:onLine
element.label: OnLine resource
element.description: Information about online sources from which the resource can be obtained

element.name: gmd:onlineResource
element.help: Define URL to access the website
element.label: Website
element.description: On-line information that can be used to contact the individual or organisation

element.name: gmd:orderingInstructions
element.label: Ordering instructions
element.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

element.name: gmd:organisationName
element.label: Organisation name
element.description: Name of the responsible organization

element.name: gmd:orientationParameterAvailability
element.label: Orientation parameter availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not orientation parameters are available

element.name: gmd:orientationParameterDescription
element.label: Orientation parameter description
element.description: Description of parameters used to describe sensor orientation

element.name: gmd:other
element.label: Other
element.description: Class of information that does not fall into the other categories to which the information applies

element.name: gmd:otherCitationDetails
element.label: Other citation details
element.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere

element.name: gmd:otherConstraints
element.label: Other constraints
element.description: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource

element.name: gmd:page
element.label: Page
element.description: Details on which pages of the publication the article was published

element.name: gmd:parameterCitation
element.label: Parameter citation
element.description: Reference providing description of the parameters

element.name: gmd:parentEntity
element.label: Parent entity
element.description: Name of the metadata entity(s) under which this extended metadata element may appear. The name(s) may be standard metadata element(s) or other extended metadata element(s).

element.name: gmd:parentIdentifier
element.label: Parent identifier
element.description: File identifier of the metadata to which this metadata is a subset (child)

element.name: gmd:pass
element.label: Pass
element.description: Indication of the conformance result where 0 = fail and 1 = pass

element.name: gmd:peakResponse
element.label: Peak response
element.description: Wavelength at which the response is the highest

element.name: gmd:phone
element.label: Phone
element.description: Telephone numbers at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: gmd:phone
element.label: Phone
element.description: Telephone numbers at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: gmd:phone
element.label: Phone
element.description: Telephone numbers at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: gmd:plannedAvailableDateTime
element.label: Planned available datetime
element.description: Date and time when the dataset will be available (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: gmd:pointInPixel
element.label: Point in Pixel
element.description: Point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

element.name: gmd:pointOfContact
element.label: Point of contact
element.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations(s) associated with the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:polygon
element.label: Polygon
element.description: Sets of points defining the bounding polygon

element.name: gmd:portrayalCatalogueCitation
element.label: Portrayal catalogue citation
element.description: Bibliographic reference to the portrayal catalogue cited

element.name: gmd:portrayalCatalogueInfo
element.label: Portrayal catalogue info
element.description: Provides information about the catalogue of rules defined for the portrayal of a resource(s)

element.name: gmd:positionName
element.label: Position name
element.description: Role or position of the responsible person

element.name: gmd:postalCode
element.label: Postal code
element.description: ZIP or other postal code

element.name: gmd:presentationForm
element.label: Presentation form
element.description: Mode in which the resource is represented

element.name: gmd:processStep
element.label: Process step
element.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:processingLevelCode
element.label: Processing level code
element.description: Image distributor_s code that identifies the level of radiometric and geometric processing that has been applied

element.name: gmd:processor
element.label: Processor
element.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the process step

element.name: gmd:protocol
element.label: Protocol
element.description: Connection protocol to be used

element.name: gmd:purpose
element.label: Purpose
element.description: Summary of the intentions with which the resource(s) was developed

element.name: gmd:radiometricCalibrationDataAvailability
element.label: Radiometric calibration data availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available

element.name: gmd:rationale
element.label: Rationale
element.description: Requirement or purpose for the process step

element.name: gmd:rationale
element.label: Rationale
element.description: Reason for creating the extended element

element.name: gmd:referenceSystemIdentifier
element.label: Reference system identifier
element.description: Name of reference system

element.name: gmd:referenceSystemInfo
element.label: Reference System Information
element.description: Description of the spatial and temporal reference systems used in the dataset

element.name: gmd:report
element.label: Report
element.description: Quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:resolution
element.label: Resolution
element.description: Degree of detail in the grid dataset

element.name: gmd:resourceConstraints
element.label: Resource constraints
element.description: Provides information about constraints which apply to the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:resourceFormat
element.label: Resource format
element.description: Provides a description of the format of the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:resourceMaintenance
element.label: Resource maintenance
element.description: Provides information about the frequency of resource updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: gmd:resourceSpecificUsage
element.label: Resource specific usage
element.description: Provides basic information about specific application(s) for which the resource(s) has/have been or is being used by different users

element.name: gmd:result
element.label: Result
element.description: Value (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure or the out come of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

element.name: gmd:role
element.label: Role
element.description: Reference to the ends (roles) of a concrete association

element.name: gmd:role
element.label: Role
element.description: Function performed by the responsible party

element.name: gmd:rule
element.label: Rule
element.description: Specifies how the extended element relates to other existing elements and entities

element.name: gmd:scaleDenominator
element.label: Scale Denominator
element.description: Denominator of the representative fraction on a source map

element.name: gmd:scaleFactor
element.label: Scale factor
element.description: Scale factor which has been applied to the cell value

element.name: gmd:schemaAscii
element.description: Full application schema given as an ASCII file
element.label: Schema ASCII
element.description: Full application schema given as an ASCII file

element.name: gmd:schemaLanguage
element.label: Schema language
element.description: Identification of the schema language used

element.name: gmd:scope
element.label: Scope
element.description: The specific data to which the data quality information applies

element.name: gmd:sequenceIdentifier
element.label: Sequence identifier
element.description: Number that uniquely identifies instances of bands of wavelengths on which a sensor operates

element.name: gmd:series
element.label: Series
element.description: Information about the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: gmd:series
element.label: Series
element.description: Information about the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: gmd:shortName
element.label: Short name
element.description: Short form suitable for use in an implementation method such as XML or SGML. NOTE other methods may be used

element.name: gmd:softwareDevelopmentFile
element.label: Software development file
element.description: Full application schema given as a software development file

element.name: gmd:softwareDevelopmentFileFormat
element.label: Software development file format
element.description: Software dependent format used for the application schema software dependent file

element.name: gmd:source
element.label: Source
element.description: Information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: gmd:source
element.label: Source
element.description: Name of the person or organization creating the extended element

element.name: gmd:sourceCitation
element.label: Source citation
element.description: Recommended reference to be used for the source data

element.name: gmd:sourceExtent
element.label: Source extent
element.description: Information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the source data

element.name: gmd:sourceReferenceSystem
element.label: Source reference system
element.description: Spatial reference system used by the source data

element.name: gmd:sourceStep
element.label: Source step
element.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the source data

element.name: gmd:southBoundLatitude
element.label: South bound
element.description: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: gmd:spatialExtent
element.label: Spatial extent
element.description: Spatial extent component of composite spatial and temporal extent

element.name: gmd:spatialRepresentationInfo
element.label: Spatial representation info
element.description: Digital representation of spatial information in the dataset

element.name: gmd:spatialRepresentationType
element.label: Spatial representation type
element.description: Method used to spatially represent geographic information

element.name: gmd:spatialResolution
element.label: Spatial resolution
element.description: Factor which provides a general understanding of the density of spatial data in the dataset

element.name: gmd:specificUsage
element.label: Specific usage
element.description: Brief description of the resource and/or resource series usage

element.name: gmd:specification
element.label: Specification
element.description: Citation of product specification or user requirement against which data is being evaluated

element.name: gmd:specification
element.label: Specification
element.description: Name of a subset, profile, or product specification of the format

element.name: gmd:statement
element.label: Statement
element.description: General explanation of the data producer_s knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

element.name: gmd:status
element.label: Status
element.description: Status of the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:supplementalInformation
element.label: Supplemental Information
element.description: Any other descriptive information about the dataset

element.name: gmd:temporalElement
element.label: Temporal element
element.description: Provides temporal component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: gmd:textGroup
element.label: TextGroup
element.description: TextGroup

element.name: gmd:thesaurusName
element.label: Thesaurus name
element.description: Name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords

element.name: gmd:title
element.label: Title
element.description: Name by which the cited resource is known

element.name: gmd:title
element.label: Title
element.description: Reference to legal title

element.name: gmd:toneGradation
element.label: Tone gradation
element.description: Number of discrete numerical values in the grid data

element.name: gmd:topicCategory
element.label: Topic category
element.description: Main theme(s) of the datset

element.name: gmd:MD_TopicCategoryCode
element.label: Topic category code
element.description: High-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive. NOTE It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.

element.name: gmd:topologyLevel
element.label: Topology level
element.description: Code which identifies the degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

element.name: gmd:transferOptions
element.label: Transfer options
element.description: Provides information about technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: gmd:transferSize
element.label: Transfer size
element.description: Estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes. The transfer size is > 0.0

element.name: gmd:transformationDimensionDescription
element.label: Transformation dimension description
element.description: Description of the information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: gmd:transformationDimensionMapping
element.label: Transformation dimension mapping
element.description: Information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: gmd:transformationParameterAvailability
element.label: Transformation parameter availability
element.description: Indication of whether or not parameters for transformation between image coordinates and geographic or map coordinates exist (are available)

element.name: gmd:triangulationIndicator
element.label: Triangulation indicator
element.description: Indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image

element.name: gmd:turnaround
element.label: Turnaround
element.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order

element.name: gmd:type
element.label: Type
element.description: Subject matter used to group similar keywords

element.name: gmd:type
element.label: Type
element.description: Datatype of the code domain

element.name: gmd:type
element.label: Type definition
element.description: Data type definition
element.help: Data type definition, formal of informal (i.e. Text12, Line)

element.name: gmd:units
element.label: Value unit
element.description: Units in which sensor wavelengths are expressed

element.name: gmd:unitsOfDistribution
element.label: Units of distribution
element.description: Tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data is available

element.name: gmd:updateScope
element.label: Update scope
element.description: Scope of data to which maintenance is applied

element.name: gmd:updateScopeDescription
element.label: Update scope description
element.description: Additional information about the range or extent of the resource

element.name: gmd:usageDateTime
element.label: Usage datetime
element.description: Date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: gmd:useConstraints
element.label: Use constraints
element.description: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource

element.name: gmd:useLimitation
element.label: Use limitation
element.description: Limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource. Example, _not to be used for navigation_

element.name: gmd:userContactInfo
element.label: User contact info
element.description: Identification of and means of communicating with person(s) and organization(s) using the resource(s)

element.name: gmd:userDefinedMaintenanceFrequency
element.label: User defined maintenance frequency
element.description: Maintenance period other than those defined

element.name: gmd:userDeterminedLimitations
element.label: User determined limitations
element.description: Applications, determined by the user for which the resource and/or resource series is not suitable

element.name: gmd:userNote
element.label: User note
element.description: Explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource or metadata
element.label: Usernote

element.name: gmd:value
element.label: Value
element.description: Quantitative value or values, content determined by the evaluation procedure used

element.name: gmd:value
element.label: Value
element.description: Data type value

element.name: gmd:valueType
element.label: Value type
element.description: Quantitative conformance quality level value or range of values

element.name: gmd:valueUnit
element.label: Value unit
element.description: Value unit for reporting a data quality result

element.name: gmd:version
element.label: Version
element.description: Version identifier for the namespace

element.name: gmd:version
element.label: Version
element.description: Version of the format (date, number, etc.)

element.name: gmd:verticalElement
element.label: Vertical element
element.description: Provides vertical component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: gmd:voice
element.label: Voice
element.description: Telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

element.name: gmd:volumes
element.label: Volumes
element.description: Number of items in the media identified

element.name: gmd:westBoundLongitude
element.label: West bound
element.description: Western-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: gml:beginPosition
element.label: Begin date
element.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

element.name: gml:endPosition
element.label: End date
element.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

element.name: gml:relatedTime
element.label: Related time
element.description: Defines the relation of a given time to the object.

element.name: gml:coordinates
element.label: Coordinates
element.description: Used to record an array of tuples or coordinates.

element.name: gml:Polygon
element.label: Polygon
element.description: A gml:Polygon is a special surface that is defined by a single surface patch. The boundary of this patch is coplanar and the polygon uses planar interpolation in its interior.

element.name: gml:Point
element.label: Point
element.description: A gml:Point is defined by a single coordinate tuple.

element.name: gml:LineString
element.label: Line
element.description: A gml:LineString is a special curve that consists of a single segment with linear interpolation. It is defined by two or more coordinate tuples, with linear interpolation between them.

element.name: gml:LinearRing
element.label: Linear ring
element.description: A gml:LinearRing is defined by four or more coordinate tuples, with linear interpolation between them; the first and last coordinates shall be coincident.

element.name: gml:exterior
element.label: Outer boundary
element.description: The outer boundary of a solid.

element.name: gml:interior
element.label: Inner boundary
element.description: The inner boundary of a solid

element.name: gml:id
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Unique identifier

element.name: gml:id
element.label: Ellipsoid
element.description: Identity of the ellipsoid used

element.name: id
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Unique identifier

element.name: srv:SV_ServiceIdentification
element.label: Service Identification (19119)
element.description: ISO 19119-2005 Service Identification

element.name: srv:serviceType
element.label: Service Type
element.description: Service type name from a registry of services. For example, the values of the nameSpace and name attributes of GeneralName may be 'OGC' and 'catalogue'

element.name: srv:serviceTypeVersion
element.label: Service Version
element.description: Provides for searching based on the version of serviceType. For example, we may only be interested in OGC Catalogue V1.1 services. If version is maintained as a separate attribute, users can easily search for all services of a type regardless of the version

element.name: srv:accessProperties
element.label: Access Properties
element.description: Information about the availability of the service eg. fees, availability, oredering instructions

element.name: srv:restrictions
element.label: Restrictions
element.description: Legal and security constraints on accessing the service and distributing data generated by the service

element.name: srv:containsOperations
element.label: Contains Operations
element.description: Provides information about the operations that comprise the service

element.name: srv:operatesOn
element.label: Operates On
element.description: Provides information on the datasets that the service operates on

element.name: srv:operationName
element.label: Operation Name
element.description: A unique identifier for this interface

element.name: srv:SV_OperationMetadata
element.label: Operation
element.description: Operation Metadata

element.name: srv:DCP
element.label: Distributed Computing Platforms
element.description: Distributed computing platforms on which the operation has been implemented

element.name: srv:operationDescription
element.label: Operation Description
element.description: Free text description of the intent of the operation and the results of the operation

element.name: srv:invocationName
element.label: Invocation Name
element.description: The name used to invoke this interface within the context of the DCP. The name is identical for all DCPs

element.name: srv:parameters
element.label: Parameters
element.description: The parameters that are required for this interface

element.name: srv:SV_Parameter
element.label: Parameter
element.description: The parameters that are required for this interface

element.name: srv:connectPoint
element.label: Connect Point
element.description: Handle for accessing the service interface

element.name: srv:dependsOn
element.label: Depends On
element.description: List of operations that must be completed immediately before current operation is invoked, structured as a list for capturing alternate predecessor paths and sets for capturing parallel predecessor paths

element.name: srv:providerName
element.label: Provider Name
element.description: A unique identifier for this organization

element.name: srv:serviceContact
element.label: Service Contact
element.description: Information for contacting the service provider

element.name: srv:name
element.label: Name
element.description: The name, as used by the service for this chain or paramater

element.name: srv:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Narrative explanation of the services in the chain and resulting output or role of the parameter

element.name: srv:optionality
element.label: Optionality
element.description: Indication if the parameter is required

element.name: srv:repeatability
element.label: Repeatability
element.description: Indication if more than one value of the parameter may be provided

element.name: srv:coupledResource
element.label: Coupled Resource
element.description: Details of services coupled with this one

element.name: srv:SV_CoupledResource
element.label: Coupled Resource
element.description: Details of services coupled with this one

element.name: srv:identifier
element.label: Identifier
element.description: Identifier of resource to which the operation applies

element.name: srv:couplingType
element.label: Coupling Type
element.description: Type of Coupling

element.name: srv:extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: Geographic/Temporal Extent of Service

element.name: srv:keywords
element.label: Keywords
element.description: Keywords describing service

element.name: gmd:locale
element.label: Other language
element.description: Use this section to define other metadata language (multilingual metadata).

element.label: Describes
element.description: Describes

element.name: gts:TM_PeriodDuration
element.label: Period duration
element.description:
The duration data type is used to specify a time interval.
The time interval is specified in the following form "PnYnMnDTnHnMnS" where:
* P indicates the period (required) * nY indicates the number of years * nM indicates the number of months * nD indicates the number of days * T indicates the start of a time section (required if you are going to specify hours, minutes, or seconds) * nH indicates the number of hours * nM indicates the number of minutes * nS indicates the number of seconds

element.name: gmd:verticalCRS
element.label: Vertical CRS
element.description: Provides information about the origin from which the maximum and minimum elevation values are measured

element.name: gmx:FileName
element.label: File name
element.description: File name and source URL.

element.name: src
element.label: Source URL
element.description: URL of the document.

element.name: hidden-elements
element.label: Hidden Elements
element.description: Child elements and attributes have been hidden because you do no have access to view those elements

element.label: Name
